ygData.subject: Re: evil in the light elf realm
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm not sure but I m pretty sure trolls and ogres can walk through east freeport I know my Dark Elf Necromancer does and his faction has changed at all.
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm not sure but I'm pretty sure trolls and ogres can walk through east
freeport I know my Dark Elf Necromancer does and his faction has changed at
all.

naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: byakhee@... <byakhee@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>;
EQ_Shaman@onelist.com <EQ_Shaman@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, September 23, 1999 10:12 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] evil in the light elf realm


>From: byakhee@...
>
> Trolls and Ogres can get to the docks through the underground tunnels.
>There is a secret entrance at the South Gate (East Freeport) in the corner
>of the wall to the left of the gate as you are facing it. Take the right
>passage at the first 2 intersections, past a human and dwarf standing in
the
>passage, and through the door further down the passage. That leads to a
>storeroom that leads out into the dock area. There is a guard that
sometimes
>patrols the docks, so be cautious.
> As to getting back on the boat in BB when you are done, without invis,
>good luck. I have no clue about that one. There used to be a dwarf guard
>swimming around in the water, so even if you make it to the docks, you
would
>still be attacked. Not sure if he is still swimming there....
>
>May Bertoxxulous' favor darken your path,
>
>Macabre, gnome necromancer
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Fraal <mata_eq@...>
>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>; <EQ_Shaman@onelist.com>
>Sent: Thursday, September 23, 1999 9:20 AM
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] evil in the light elf realm
>
>
>> From: "Fraal" <mata_eq@...>
>>
>> nice to know once I am too BB, but how can a Troll get to the boat?
>They
>> are KOS in Freeport right?
>> What about Ogres?
>>
>>
>> >
>> > Heh gonna be a pain, but jump off the boat to the right of the docks
and
>> > follow the water to it's end... Then just stay up high on the right
zone
>> > wall and walk along it all the way up it... You have about a 95% chance
>of
>> > not getting jumped that way..
>> >

>> > >friends safely past bb? Also, is there anyplace there
>> > >that we can sell? Or buy food for that matter. :)
>> > >
